title: GDG DevFest NYC 2016
subscribe-note: No spam, only the latest news and updates!
tickets-details: Tickets provide attendance to all sessions at this venue and cover lunch and coffee.
run-out-tickets: There are no more tickets available in this tier.
team-page-text:
DevFest NYC is a community-run and volunteer-driven conference for developers, by developers, and organized by Google Developer Group (New York). Our team consists of designers, developers, students and professionals who share a common love for technology and community.

This year, we have an ambitious program with multiple tracks including a technical program, workshops, codelabs and a hackathon. We could not have done it without the people listed here!
description: A community-run conference focused on emerging technologies and software development tools and practices in the fields of mobile and web development, virtual reality, cloud computing, machine learning and physical web
social-motto: Add to circles, like, follow or connect with us on
click-to-view-photos: Click here to view more photos
location-description: Flatiron School is an outcomes-focused coding bootcamp that has helped thousands of learners become valuable programmers.
about-organizers: DevFestNYC is organized by members of GDG New York, a community-led technology organization with a focus on mobile, web and cloud computing, machine learning and other emerging technologies.
about-gdg: DevFest is an annual conference run by Google Developer Group chapters worldwide. It is a conference for developers, by developers. DevFest NYC has five tracks - tech talks, workshops, codelabs, hackathon & GoLang training
